text: The Treaty of Wallingford, also known as the Treaty of Winchester or the Treaty of Westminster, was an agreement reached in England in the summer of 1153. It was agreed at Wallingford Castle. == Sources == * Bradbury, Jim. (1996) Stephen and Matilda: The Civil War of 1139â€“53. Sutton Publishing. . * King, Edmund. (2010) King Stephen. New Haven, U.S.: Yale University Press. . Category:Treaties Category:12th century in England Category:1153
title: Treaty of Wallingford
